@graph.reasoning: Pricing decisions of a legitimate joint venture do not fall within the narrow category of activity that is per se unlawful under ยง 1 of the Sherman Act

@graph.involvedParties: National Collegiate Athletic Assn., Board of Regents of Univ. of Okla.
@graph.reasoning: Ancillary restraints doctrine governs the validity of restrictions imposed by a legitimate business collaboration, such as a business association or joint venture, on nonventure activities
Ancillary restraints doctrine governs the validity of restrictions imposed by a legitimate business collaboration, such as a business association or joint venture, on nonventure activities
Quick look doctrine applied to business activities that are so plainly anticompetitive that courts need undertake only a cursory examination before imposing antitrust liability
